description:
Having lost Ania to Asura Cryin` Kagakagari, Tomoharu and the others search the room of Kotori, a student teacher working at Rakurowa High School during Christina`s stay in Japan. On the other side of the city, Ania is reunited with her sister, her body already vanishing from the strain of powering the Splitter, a machine used to separate burial dolls from their Asura Machina. Requiring the luck eater`s abilities to power the Splitter, Kagakagari attempts to use Ania in place of her weakened sister...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Connected by the Chains of Time
